page.title: 03CONWAY VALLEY NURSERIES
page.content:
The Conwy valley has a concentration of nurseries which are attracted by its equable climate in the rain shadow of Snowdonia and the rich glacial soils of the valley. The Conway (n.b. English spelling) Valley Nurseries are situated at GR 781738, surprisingly on a NE facing slope above the Afon Conwy. The business concentrates on roses , trees, shrubs, and fruit trees which it sells both direct to the public and wholesale to other trade outlets.
Ther is part of one other nursary in the area attached to Bodnant Gardens.
